overview: Comedy - A hit-and-run accident puts Rose in a coma. When she awakens with amnesia, Rose is asked by her rescuer Kam to stay while she gets her memory back. Rose gradually falls for Kam, but soon realizes her relationship to him and his horrible truth. - Chow Chun Wing - Director, Lui Fong, Teresa Mak Kar-kei, Gwen Lok Ying

production_companies.name: B&S Limited (B&S Films Creation Works House)

title: 45 Days Lover
